title: Not So Fast: Apple’s New iPad Pro Isn’t Get Microsoft Office for Free - newsR
text: Apple unveiled at its September 9 event earlier this month the brand new iPad Pro, a new device that’s pushing the company towards the productivity side of the market more than ever. And because productivity also means working with documents, spreadsheets, and presentations at any given moment, Apple introduc... »
